TextLibrary.Text: Flicker
Flame
Mother!
Mother!
Mother!
Mother!
Flicker, is that you?
Flicker, is that you?
Flicker, is that you?
Flicker, is that you?
I've been looking for you for so long...
I've been looking for you for so long...
I've been looking for you for so long...
I've been looking for you for so long...
Oh, never mind me! Look at you - you haven't been eating properly. You're all skinny around the haunches.
Oh, never mind me! Look at you - you haven't been eating properly. You're all skinny around the haunches.
Oh, never mind me! Look at you - you haven't been eating properly. You're all skinny around the haunches.
Oh, never mind me! Look at you - you haven't been eating properly. You're all skinny around the haunches.
Mother...
Mother...
Mother...
Mother...
Don't you 'mother' me, Flicker. You get yourself back to the Dragonrealm right this minute. You need a good sheep or two to put some weight on you.
Don't you 'mother' me, Flicker. You get yourself back to the Dragonrealm right this minute. You need a good sheep or two to put some weight on you.
Don't you 'mother' me, Flicker. You get yourself back to the Dragonrealm right this minute. You need a good sheep or two to put some weight on you.
Don't you 'mother' me, Flicker. You get yourself back to the Dragonrealm right this minute. You need a good sheep or two to put some weight on you.
Mother, I can't.
Mother, I can't.
Mother, I can't.
Mother, I can't.
Don't you talk back to me now, Flicker.
Don't you talk back to me now, Flicker.
Don't you talk back to me now, Flicker.
Don't you talk back to me now, Flicker.
No, I can't. I'm helping these people - they rescued me from a trap. Elistara is a Dragonknight and I'm going to be her mount!
No, I can't. I'm helping these people - they rescued me from a trap. Elistara is a Dragonknight and I'm going to be her mount!
No, I can't. I'm helping these people - they rescued me from a trap. Elistara is a Dragonknight and I'm going to be her mount!
No, I can't. I'm helping these people - they rescued me from a trap. Elistara is a Dragonknight and I'm going to be her mount!
You're going to let one of them ride you? I've never understood why some Dragons allow that - no self-respect. Why would YOU want to do it?
You're going to let one of them ride you? I've never understood why some Dragons allow that - no self-respect. Why would YOU want to do it?
You're going to let one of them ride you? I've never understood why some Dragons allow that - no self-respect. Why would YOU want to do it?
You're going to let one of them ride you? I've never understood why some Dragons allow that - no self-respect. Why would YOU want to do it?
They're my friends, mother.
They're my friends, mother.
They're my friends, mother.
They're my friends, mother.
I see... well you amuse yourself with these new friends of yours, and when you're done, you come back and see me, okay?
I see... well you amuse yourself with these new friends of yours, and when you're done, you come back and see me, okay?
I see... well you amuse yourself with these new friends of yours, and when you're done, you come back and see me, okay?
I see... well you amuse yourself with these new friends of yours, and when you're done, you come back and see me, okay?
Okay, mother. Umm... It IS good to see you again.
Okay, mother. Umm... It IS good to see you again.
Okay, mother. Umm... It IS good to see you again.
Okay, mother. Umm... It IS good to see you again.
It's good to see you too, son. Now run along and play.
It's good to see you too, son. Now run along and play.
It's good to see you too, son. Now run along and play.
It's good to see you too, son. Now run along and play.
